other_tests.findings: Diagnosis of cheyletiellosis and delusional parasitosis considered; no actual infestation identified.
other_tests.changes_over_time: On monitoring, the patient admitted to having compulsively picked at her skin, consistent with neurotic excoriations; she no longer visualized bugs.

other_tests.findings: Amphetamine-induced psychosis with delusional parasitosis and neurotic excoriations.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-discharge, the patient no longer expressed concern about parasitic infection, and skin excoriations improved but did not completely resolve.
